title: Charming Family Duplex with Green Surroundings in Pila Suburbs
description: Welcome to your dream duplex! This spacious 162 sqm family home features 3 cozy bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms, offering the perfect blend of comfort and privacy. The open-plan living space is flooded with natural light and direct access to a shared courtyard, ideal for gatherings or quiet moments. Recently fitted with air conditioning, this home ensures year-round comfort, while residents enjoy access to an on-site fitness center.
neighborhood_description: Located in Pila’s tranquil 'Suburb' neighborhood, this property is nestled in a serene area renowned for its lush greenery and a welcoming, community-focused atmosphere. Ideal for those who appreciate the outdoors and relaxed suburban living, the area also offers convenient highway connections for easy trips to the city or surrounding countryside.
target_buyer: Perfect for retired couples or multi-generational families seeking a peaceful, sociable environment with modern amenities and easy access to countryside leisure and travel options.
market_positioning: This duplex uniquely combines accessible suburban pricing, upgraded amenities ideal for retirees, and a harmonious neighborhood—positioned as a rare opportunity in Pila’s family-friendly suburbs for buyers seeking low-density living without sacrificing comfort or activity options.
